node.title: 'Life will never be the same': Young mother's despair as father pleads guilty to killing six-month-old
node.alt: A blue and white cot inside a house with other objects and clothes on the carpet around it.
node.description: Evander Wilson, 21, pleaded guilty before the Supreme Court over his actions at his Mildura home in April 2020 that led to the death of his baby son, Jakobi.
node.content:
["A teenage mother has told the Supreme Court of her despair after her drug-affected partner killed their six-month-old son during Victoria's first pandemic lockdown.", "WARNING: This story contains details that some readers will find", "Evander Wilson, 21,\u00a0pleaded guilty to one count of child homicide, relating to the death of his son Jakobi Wilson at the family home in Mildura in April last year.", "The court heard Wilson dragged his then 18-year-old partner into the lounge room by her hair and punched her several times, after a pizza delivery arrived without soft drink.", "The court heard Wilson was not coping with Victoria's COVID lockdown, and had been using drugs heavily and playing an Xbox, while locked down with two small children, his teenage partner and a new puppy.", "After his mother was assaulted, baby Jakobi began to cry\u00a0and his father picked him up and started bouncing him on his knee without supporting his head, the court\u00a0was told.", "The baby later became unresponsive, and both parents assisted with trying to perform CPR.", "Jakobi\u00a0later died in hospital.", "
'Life will never be the same', baby's\u00a0mother says
", "Jakobi's mother told the court her son's death crushed her into a million pieces.", "\"Since that night I have been totally lost and don't know how to cope with the loss of my baby,\" she said.", "\"I had so much self-blame, constantly thinking if I had got out of this violent relationship sooner I would have never lost Jakobi.\"", "", "
The court heard Wilson became violent towards his partner after a mistake in a pizza order made him angry.(Supplied: Supreme Court of Victoria)
", "The court heard the parents met when teenagers and relied heavily on support workers during the pandemic lockdown.", "The baby's mother told the court her son was supposed to be protected and loved by his father but\u00a0he wasn't.", "\"I just feel so betrayed and hurt,\" the woman said.", "\"I'll never be able to forgive Evander for taking my baby away.", "\"Never in a million years to ever think he will be capable of doing what he did that night and now I have to live with a hole in the heart every single day.", "\"My life will never be the same.\"", "Wilson's defence lawyer Sam Andrianakis submitted to Justice Elizabeth Hollingworth that his client was genuinely remorseful.", "He said the 21-year-old had hugged his son's body in hospital and said, \"Daddy's sorry\".", "The court heard Wilson had an abusive and violent childhood and started smoking cannabis daily when he was nine years old.", "Justice Hollingworth will\u00a0sentence Wilson tomorrow."]
